title: Seamless Charging Network is Key to EV Adoption. Here's What's Coming
description: Pres. Biden just announced a push for 500,000 electric-vehicle charging sites. Aaron Fisher, CEO of EVPassport, speaks with MarketWatch's Rachel Beals to explore a closed vs. open charging system, the role of utilities, how car makers and charging vendors might work together, and more.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Pres. Biden just announced a push for 500,000 electric-vehicle charging sites. Aaron Fisher, CEO of EVPassport, speaks with MarketWatch's Rachel Beals to explore a closed vs. open charging system, the role of utilities, how car makers and charging vendors might work together, and more.
